original_text: I will make you very ashamed. People will never forget your great shame.’ I will make you very ashamed. People will never forget your great shame.’
korean_text: 너희는 영원한 치욕과 잊지 못할 영구한 수치를 당하게 하리라 하셨느니라

sentences.original_text: I will make you very ashamed.
People will never forget your great shame.'
sentences.korean_translation: 사람들이 너의 큰 수치를 결코 잊지 못하리라.'
